TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CorrelationInitializer extends System.Object

Docs.summary: 特定相关初始值设定项的抽象基类，这些初始值设定项用于通知运行时相关要使用的协议。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存在，则运行时使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> 进行关联，否则将使用消息传递活动的 **CorrelatesWith** 属性。 如果二者都不存在，则将使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> 提供的环境句柄或工作流服务。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property CorrelationHandle As InArgument(Of CorrelationHandle)

public: property System::Activities::InArgument<System::ServiceModel::Activities::CorrelationHandle ^> ^ CorrelationHandle { System::Activities::InArgument<System::ServiceModel::Activities::CorrelationHandle ^> ^ get(); void set(System::Activities::InArgument<System::ServiceModel::Activities::CorrelationHandle ^> ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]
[set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

Docs.summary: 获取或设置相关初始值设定项的 参数。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果存在，则运行时使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> 进行关联，否则将使用消息传递活动的 **CorrelatesWith** 属性。 如果二者都不存在，则将使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> 提供的环境句柄或工作流服务。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply> 活动中指定相关初始值设定项。
[!code-csharp[ContentBasedCorrelation#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/contentbasedcorrelation/cs/service.cs#2)]
